positions.description: As a junior fullstack engineer at Infomaniak, I'm continuing to work in the Ticketing team as I did during my internship. I work mainly on the backend in Laravel, but also on the frontend in Angular. I'm an integral part of the SCRUM development team. I actively participate in several guilds, such as the backend guild and especially the recruitment guild.

During my work internship at Infomaniak, I was involved in developing new features for a ticketing management application. This application offers a complete ticketing service for companies, associations and various organisations that organise events.

skills: Laravel, MariaDB, Angular, Git, Docker, Jira, SCRUM, Communication

positions.description: As an intern at Reactional Music, I worked on an application for music composers, and I developed some features like settings page, login to a reactional account or management of themes. This application allows composers to create and share their music themes for video games.

skills: Express, React, TypeScript, GitLab, Firebase, Figma, Notion, Agility

positions.description: I worked as a ventilation fitter during my summer holidays. I learned to work in a team and to adapt to different situations.
